metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10873 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Poppler 0.74.0. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function SplashClip::clipAALine at splash/SplashClip.cc.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> code is different in cosmic-. doesn't look vulnerable, doesn't reproduce

criterions.comment: poppler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
